sentences.en: "We went into a market and established a kiosk in that market out of a butcher's shop," Kalanda says.
sentences.cn: 卡兰达说，“由于一家肉店，我们进入这个市场，在那个市场我们建立了一个公用电话亭”

sentences.en: A kiosk showing a printed map of downtown, for example, is information in the world.
sentences.cn: 例如, 公用信息亭张贴的城镇地图就是世界中的消息.

sentences.en: A telephone kiosk with height glazing and folding door can also act as a rain shelter.
sentences.cn: 电话亭-拥有落地玻璃和摺门,亦可供途人用作避雨亭.

sentences.en: A telephone kiosk with sculptures outside was designed to provide highest convenience for users.
sentences.cn: 视像电话亭于使用时会自动关门,方便使用者.电话亭外的石像雕塑使之成为艺术品的一部份.

sentences.en: Bob: Is a kiosk the same thing as a concession stand?
sentences.cn: 鲍伯: 售货亭是不是就是电影院里的小卖部呀?

sentences.en: But when she returned to her hometown in early 1960 s, the kiosk was no more.
sentences.cn: 但当她于60年代初回到家乡, 小售货亭再也不见了.

sentences.en: He operated a small tea shop there, a portable metal kiosk from which he served low-ranking bureaucrats who worked in the surrounding government offices.
sentences.cn: 如今他在这里开设了一家小茶亭——那是个轻便的金属亭子，为附近政府机构的低级别官员提供服务。

sentences.en: He phoned me from a kiosk.
sentences.cn: 他在公用电话亭给我打了电话。

sentences.en: I bought a magazine at the station kiosk.
sentences.cn: 我在车站报摊上买了一本杂志.

sentences.en: I was getting cigarettes at the kiosk.
Is there sufficient room for the kiosk and kiosk traffic without impeding other user traffic?
sentences.cn: 该环境下是否有足够的空间来摆放信息亭?信息亭是否会妨碍交通或者行走?

sentences.en: Susie: I am going to the kiosk for a beverage.
sentences.cn: 苏茜: 我要去售货亭买点饮料.

sentences.en: There is a small black bamboo beside the kiosk in the garden.
sentences.cn: 园林中的亭子边,有一小片墨竹林.

sentences.en: Uncle and I are standing in line at the hamburger kiosk.
sentences.cn: 我和叔叔排队站在汉堡包摊前.

sentences.en: We found that only about 5% of the time did people bother to tell the kiosk that they took an accessory.
sentences.cn: 我们发现，只有在近5%的情况下，人们肯在数字亭中留下自己领取配件的信息。

sentences.en: We produce some kinds of kiosk, You can choose it on your basis.
sentences.cn: 我们生产不同种类的亭子, 您可以根据您的要求来选择.

sentences.en: We were eating hamburgers at a kiosk.
sentences.cn: 我们在一家小亭里吃汉堡包.

sentences.en: When designing kiosk interfaces, carefully consider the use of sound.
sentences.cn: 在设计信息亭界面时, 要小心考虑声音的使用.

trans.tran_cn: 【网络】自助服务终端；一体机；Kiosk (KDE)；小卖部
亭子，凉亭，（车站、广场等处的）书报摊，，公共电话亭，小摊棚，售货亭
trans.tran_en: a small building in the street, where newspapers, sweets etc are sold
